Presentation.title: Full Stack Developer
Presentation.subtitle: I'm a young full stack developer based in Annecy, France. I have a passion for web development and love to create a fully functional website from A to Z. I am currently looking for an apprenticeship as a full stack developer.

About.title: About me
About.subtitle: One of my goals as a developer is to be able to create applications that can help people in their daily lives. I'm a developer who's passionate about technology and new trends. I love learning new things and I'm always ready to take on new challenges. Another of my goals is to have a GitHub full of projects with as many technologies as possible, but I'd especially like to focus on web or mobile development.
